personal_profile.name: Hector Ha
personal_profile.title: Full-Stack Developer & Former UI/UX Designer
personal_profile.elevator_pitch: I am a meticulous Full-Stack Developer with a unique background in UI/UX design. I bridge the gap between creative vision and technical execution, building user-centric applications that don't lose the experience in translation. My expertise spans the MERN stack, Next.js, and high-fidelity prototyping.

career_objective: A meticulous developer fluent in both logic and aesthetics, bridging the gap between creative vision and technical execution.
core_competencies: Full-stack web development (React, Next.js, Node.js, TypeScript)
UI/UX design background with 2 years professional experience

career_story.origin: I started in Computer Software Engineering, but found a passion for design. Working as a UI/UX Designer gave me a deep appreciation for the user, but I realized I wanted to build the final product myself.

key_transitions.reason: To control the end-to-end user experience and prevent design details from being lost in translation.
key_transitions.outcome: A unique ability to design beautiful interfaces and implement them with robust code.

career_story.current_focus: I am currently focused on mastering modern web frameworks like Next.js and integrating AI into practical web applications.
career_story.future_goals: I aim to become a Lead Full-Stack Engineer who can guide both design and technical decisions.

working_style.collaboration_approach: I believe in clear communication and early feedback. My design background helps me communicate effectively with both designers and potential users.
working_style.problem_solving_process: I approach problems from both a user perspective (Is this intuitive?) and a technical one (Is this scalable?).
working_style.communication_style: Direct, detailed, and visual. I often use prototypes or diagrams to explain complex ideas.
working_style.ideal_work_environment: A collaborative, fast-paced environment that values both code quality and user experience.

professional: The intersection of design and development
fun_facts: My AI assistant is based on Miles Edgeworth because I value logic and truth!
I have a 3.94 GPA in Software Engineering.
